sentences: Ma vajutan nuppule, et saada ühendust.
Ta püüab alati suhinda kõigega, kellega ühendust võtab.
Kui sul on küsimusi, saad ühendust minuga.
context: The word 'ühendust' refers to establishing communication or contact with someone. It can be used in both literal and metaphorical contexts, such as making a phone call, sending an email, or engaging in conversation.
